Summary: rotating circular light above the clouds
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Chino
There were no other sightings in Chino on or around October 25th 2006
divs: sighting detailsever since my first ufo sighting (just submitted that one) i regularly go outside and just look up. it was about 7pm at night and was a very cloudy night.. i was looking up and i noticed a big circular light that was making a big circle above the clouds. i thought it might have been one of those event sky lights but there was no trail to follow and it was moving very quickly above the clouds. i could see the outline of it doing its circular pattern. i tried videotaping the object but it was too dark to pick anything up. i followed it for about an hour as the clouds moved the object went with it, continuing its big circular rotation. i watched it till the cloud went out of sight. the whole time there was no trail of light going back to the ground. i was just amazed watching it because ive seen planes and helicopters.. but none of them made a big circular pattern very quickly. it looked like a skylight end would look (circular white light). but it had no light tail and wasnt emitting light to the ground, only visible in\on top of the cloud.
